From Movies.Yahoo.com:

Horrible. don't watch! A few tips
by yaron_l Aug 15, 2006 

The first movie had an intersting story line, and it first taught us about this "effect" on going to the past and changing things.

In this movie, the same happens, nothing is new, the story line is so predictable (after watching 5 mins). The acting of the "effect" is quite poorly.

And the ending of the movie is pictures from the movie for a few mins (before the credit) waste of time, run as fast at you can.

A few tips on how the movie would have been much better:
1. Change the original "effect" to something different, more interesting.

2. Don't give so much hints on the rest of the plot in the first 5 minuts.

3. Change the story to something more intersting, not a stupid "Boy loves girl" as the first one. how bout a "Girl likes girl" or "boy like boy".

4. How about the end of the world? talking bout chaos, why not show how a simple change, caused the end of the world, and not just the end of a friendship.

5. Don't show idiotical pictures in the end of the movie for 5 minuts, because you need more "show time". If you need something, you'd rather show bloopers, with a D rated movie like this one.

6. Don't do what everyone else is doing!
